text: In Greek mythology, the Epigoni are the progeny of the heroes who fought in the First Theban War. Epigoni can also refer to: * Epigoni (play), a lost play by Sophocles * Epigoni (epic), a lost early Greek epic poem, sequel to the Thebaid * Epigoni, the progeny of the Diadochi of Alexander the Great
title: Epigoni (disambiguation)
